thread.title: Video: Facebook unveils Internet-beaming drone with wingspan of a 737
thread.title_full: Video: Facebook unveils Internet-beaming drone with wingspan of a 737 - MarketWatch

author: By     MarketWatch
title: Video: Facebook unveils Internet-beaming drone with wingspan of a 737
text:
Facebook reveals its solar-powered drone to spread Internet (1:29) Facebook unveiled a full-scale version of its connected solar-power drone on Thursday. The plane, named Aquila, is designed to fly for 90 days above weather systems, bringing Internet connectivity to remote regions where cell towers or fiber-optic cable may be difficult to deploy.
More from MarketWatch
